content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1581597772628{margin-top: 55px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-6″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1712660215213{padding-top: 30px !important;}” css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

The ASNU GDI Box

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=””]

The ASNU GDI Adapter Box has been designed to drive Gasoline Direct Injection (GDI) injectors with an approved supply of current and voltage to simulate injector electronic operation as on the engine. Correct Electronic Operation is critical when examining the injector’s response to changes in mS & RPM. Examination of the injectors Fuel Distribution and Atomisation is equally critical to the Engine’s Correct Running, Performance, Fuel Economy and Emission Outputs. Even the slightest irregularity in the Fuel Spray pattern would result in illumination of the Engine Check Light, but with no specific cause identified.

GDI injectors are difficult and time consuming to remove and re-fit! Would you fit a new set of injectors without ensuring they are working correctly?

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-6″]
[vc_column_text]*Click to enlarge image[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1709039677514{margin-top: 70px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1550340774959{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” el_id=”brightLargeBlocks”][vc_column css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1550326245867{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #f0f4f6 !important;}” el_class=”explore” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-xs-12″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1550335401941{margin-top: 20px !important;}” css_animation=”none”]

Latest

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1550322294328{margin-top: -20px !important;}” css_animation=”none”]

Technology

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1708017457381{padding-top: 5px !important;}” css_animation=”none”]ASNU have now taken their Injector Diagnostics Programme to the next level, where Performance and Racing teams need to know and understand greater the injectors operation and performance, ASNU set the standards and met their requirements.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” el_class=”explore” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1550334712529{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;background-color: #f0f4f6 !important;}”]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1708017375591{margin-top: 20px !important;}” css_animation=”none”]

UK Manufactured

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1708017413897{margin-top: -20px !important;}” css_animation=”none”]

Built to Last

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1714052492049{padding-top: 5px !important;}” css_animation=”none”]ASNU are the global leader in the Testing & Servicing of gasoline injectors for the automotive industry. With over 30 years of experience, our continued investment R&D has resulted in major partnerships across the automotive sector. ASNU offer a range of systems to suit all markets.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” el_class=”explore” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1550334750174{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;background-color: #f0f4f6 !important;}”]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1708349691543{margin-top: 20px !important;}” css_animation=”none”]

Projetos Especiais

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1708349733379{margin-top: -20px !important;}” css_animation=”none”]

Performance

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1708349459196{padding-top: 5px !important;}” css_animation=”none”]Our investment in R&D has taken our Injector Diagnostics Programme to the next level, where Performance and Racing teams need to understand and diagnose the injectors operation and performance and ASNU set the standards in this demanding environment[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1501247507416{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1550324610280{margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://asnu.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/7_mini-1.jpg?id=18) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-xs-12″]
[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1708343305198{background-color: #0094ce !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-xs-12″]

Precision manufactured Injector diagnostic machines.

ASNU Classic GDI

Manufactured to last
Full aftersales service and machine maintenance.

The ASNU Classic GDI:
Test and Service Every Gasoline Injector ever produced!. K-JET/PORT/SIDE-FEED/TOP FEED/MONOPOINT/GDI/SOLENOID/PIEZO

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1581597679012{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1581592215363{padding-right: 80px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #2c2e3d !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3″]
[vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

ASNU

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]ASNU are global leaders in the Testing & Servicing of gasoline injectors for the automotive industry.[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1583492373997{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #f0f3f2 !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1583492269019{padding-top: 10px !important;}” css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

01.

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]

ASNU Machines

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]ASNU are manufactures of the world-leading Gasoline Injector Diagnostic Testing & Servicing Systems & have distribution in over 60 countries worldwide[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1583492120893{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #f0f3f2 !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1583492277017{padding-top: 10px !important;}” css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

02.

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]

Produtos De Performance

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]ASNU Performance Injectors are purpose-designed and built injector with the ideal spray pattern to match the flow required.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1583492128344{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #f0f3f2 !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1583492283906{padding-top: 10px !important;}” css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

03.

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]

Projetos Especiais

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]Pushing the boundaries to set new benchmarks in the realm of automotive design.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
